question:
Which among the following is / are correct statements with respect to the Gallabaksha System?
1. This system was generally prevailing in central India including Malwa, Bundelkhand etc.
2. The division of the crop was done after the crop was cut
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Gallabakhsh was a system of assessment in which the crop produce was divided after it was cut. It was prevalent in most parts of North West Boundaries of India i.e. modern Afghanistan, Pakistan, and parts of POK.
